title: Blog Pages & Content Display
description: Build all blog-related pages including homepage, post listing, individual post pages, tag filtering, and about page. Implement MDX rendering with custom components and ensure optimal SEO.

stories.title: Build homepage with hero and recent posts
acceptance_criteria: Homepage (/) with hero section introducing Dakota Smith
Recent posts section showing 6 most recent posts in grid
CTA button to view all posts (/blog)
Hero uses brutalist design with high-contrast text
Responsive grid: 1 column mobile, 2 tablet, 3 desktop
stories.apl_goal: Create homepage with hero section, fetch and display 6 most recent posts using Card components, implement responsive grid layout, and add 'View All Posts' CTA
technical_notes: Fetch posts with getAllPosts() utility sorted by date
Hero section should include short bio and social links
Use next/image for hero background or accent graphic

stories.title: Create blog listing page with pagination
acceptance_criteria: Blog listing page (/blog) showing all published posts
Pagination with 12 posts per page
Previous/Next navigation with page numbers
Page numbers are accessible and keyboard navigable
Static generation for each paginated page
stories.apl_goal: Build /blog page with pagination (12 posts per page), implement generateStaticParams for all pages, create accessible pagination controls with prev/next buttons
technical_notes: Page 1 should be accessible at both /blog and /blog/page/1
Use generateStaticParams to pre-render all paginated pages

stories.title: Implement tag filtering page
acceptance_criteria: Tag filter page (/blog/tags/[tag]) showing posts with specific tag
Page title shows 'Posts tagged with [Tag Name]'
Count of posts displayed
generateStaticParams pre-renders all tag pages
404 page for non-existent tags
stories.apl_goal: Create dynamic tag filtering page at /blog/tags/[tag], implement getPostsByTag utility, use generateStaticParams to pre-render all tag pages, and handle non-existent tags gracefully
technical_notes: Extract all unique tags from all posts
Display tag name in human-readable format (not slug)

stories.title: Create post page layout with hero image
acceptance_criteria: Individual post page at /blog/[slug]
Hero image displayed at top (full-width or contained)
Post metadata (date, reading time, tags) displayed prominently
Responsive typography with proper line-height and measure
Table of contents generated from headings (h2, h3)
stories.apl_goal: Build post page template at /blog/[slug], implement hero image display with next/image, show post metadata, generate table of contents from MDX headings, and ensure readable typography
technical_notes: Use generateStaticParams to pre-render all posts
Extract headings during MDX compilation for TOC
Max content width: 65ch for optimal readability

stories.title: Implement MDX component overrides for rich content
acceptance_criteria: Custom components for MDX elements (h1-h6, p, a, img, blockquote, ul, ol)
Links styled with brutalist underline and hover effect
Images use next/image with proper aspect ratios
Blockquotes have distinct brutalist border/background treatment
Code blocks use CodeBlock component from Epic 2
stories.apl_goal: Create MDX components object with styled overrides for all standard markdown elements, integrate CodeBlock component for code fences, and ensure consistent neo-brutalist styling
technical_notes: Map code blocks to CodeBlock component
Add external link icon for anchor tags with external hrefs
Style lists with custom bullets/numbers matching design system

stories.title: Create About page with bio and contact
acceptance_criteria: About page (/about) with Dakota's bio and background
Contact section with mailto link (no form needed)
Social links (GitHub @daksmitty, etc.)
Professional photo or avatar with next/image
Markdown or MDX content for easy editing
stories.apl_goal: Build About page with bio content, mailto contact link, social links, and optional avatar image, using MDX for easy content updates

architectural_decisions: Static Site Generation (SSG) for all pages using generateStaticParams
12 posts per page for pagination (optimal for performance and UX)
Table of contents auto-generated from MDX headings
MDX component overrides for consistent styling
Tag pages pre-rendered for all tags at build time

verification_requirements.pencil_check: Page layouts and content display must be visually verified against Pencil canvas designs. Verify neo-brutalist styling consistency, responsive behavior, and typography hierarchy.
verification_requirements.acceptance_criteria_addition: Visual design verified against Pencil canvas selections
